polimi.reds.broker.routing
Class DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator

java.lang.Object
  polimi.reds.broker.routing.DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator
All Implemented Interfaces:
NeighborhoodChangeListener, PacketListener, Reconfigurator
public class DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reconfigurator, PacketListener

This class handles reconfigurations using the Timed Deferred Unsubscription or the Notified Deferred Unsubscription protocol. The protocol variant to use is chosen in the constructor.
Note that if you create this class in the timed version and using a timeout of 0, the class behaves as in the Strawman protocol.

The protocols are described in "Content-Based Routing for Publish-Subscribe on a Dynamic Topology: Concepts, Protocols and Evaluation", by G. Cugola, D. Frey, A.L. Murphy and G.P. Picco.

Author:
Andrea Milani

Constructor Detail

DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator

public DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator(boolean notified)
Creates a new DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator using the default timeout (3000L ms) for the deferral of unsubscriptions.

Parameters:
notified - see the two parameter constructor.

DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator

public DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator(boolean notified,
                                            long deferTimeout)
Creates a new DeferredUnsubscriptionReconfigurator using the specified parameters.

Parameters:
notified - true to use the "notified" version of the protocol, false to use the "timed" version.
deferTimeout - timeout (in milliseconds) to use for the deferral of unsubscriptions.
Method Detail

setDeferTimeout

public void setDeferTimeout(long timeout)
Sets the timeout to use for the deferral of unsubscriptions. The new setting will take effect starting from the next reconfiguration.

Parameters:
timeout - the deferral timeout, in milliseconds.

notifyNeighborAdded

public void notifyNeighborAdded(NodeDescriptor addedNeighbor,
                                java.io.Serializable reconfInfo)
Description copied from interface: NeighborhoodChangeListener
This method is called whenever a new neighbor connects (or is connected).

Specified by:
notifyNeighborAdded in interface NeighborhoodChangeListener
Parameters:
addedNeighbor - The NodeDescriptor of the added neighbor.
reconfInfo - additional information about the topology change.
The Reconfigurator can use this information to optimize the reconfiguration process. The actual information contained in the parameter depends on the combination of topology manager and reconfigurator in use.
This parameter can be null if the topology manager does not support providing additional information, or there is no information to provide.

Specified by:
notifyNeighborDead in interface NeighborhoodChangeListener
Parameters:
deadNeighbor - The NodeDescriptor of the no more reachable neighbor.
reconfInfo - additional information about the topology change.
The Reconfigurator can use this information to optimize the reconfiguration process. The actual information contained in the parameter depends on the combination of topology manager and reconfigurator in use.
This parameter can be null if the topology manager does not support providing additional information, or there is no information to provide.
